## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                                     | Type      | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `animation` | `animation` | The name of the animation (`cylon`, `cylon-vertical`, `spin`, `spin-reverse`, `fade`, `throb`). | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `base`      | `base`      | The base path, where the icons are located (must be a public url).                              | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `flipH`     | `flip-h`    | When set to `true`, the icon will be flipped horizontally.                                      | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `flipV`     | `flip-v`    | When set to `true`, the icon will be flipped vertically.                                        | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `name`      | `name`      | The name/id of the icon (e.g. 1000, 1001, ...).                                                 | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `rotate`    | `rotate`    | The `number` of degree for the css `rotate` transformation.                                     | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `scale`     | `scale`     | The `number` for the css `scale` transformation.                                                | `number`  | `undefined` |
